transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hi, speaking.
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Yes, I actually called you regarding IndiaMART.
Customer: Yeah, tell me.
Executive: So you tell ma'am, I have already narrated you the entire thing that we will be guiding you online, right?
Customer: Oh yes, I told you right. It's okay, we are okay with that.
Executive: We are okay with the online service and close the ticket everything.
Customer: You can close the ticket, I told you that day itself, right? Saturday itself I told you.
Customer: You can close the ticket and I'm okay.
Customer: I'm okay with that. We are okay with that. Uh, it's okay that we are okay for the Google Meet and whatever service you provide through online. We will attend the meet, that's it.
Executive: You can close the ticket.
Customer: Not about that, ma'am, closing or something. Just about that, uh, the field, you told now field support regarding. So what's the conclusion regarding that?
Customer: Uh, that's what you told, right? You won't be able to provide the, uh, field visit. So I told you, right? It's okay, we are okay with that.
Executive: So what I'm saying?
Customer: You said this, right? You won't be able to provide the field visit, the pin code won't be supporting, right?
Customer: And but Saturday will I told you can, it's okay, we will attend the Google Meet and the calls whatever you give.
Executive: Okay, okay, okay.
Executive: While any other issue you have, like we can work over it like over the bank details and everything.
Customer: What?
Executive: Any other issue you have?
Customer: As if now we don't have. We, we are getting leads, but it's not like they are already got, they have already purchased and only simply they are looking like that leads are coming as if now. We didn't got even one sale from as if now the leads which you have provided.
Customer: So we are contacting the customers, but everyone are saying like we don't want. So kindly check into that. That's it. Other than that nothing else.
Executive: No issue.
Executive: So one more thing I would like to tell you, today you got requirement regarding trolley speakers.
Customer: Uh, we are checking into that. So in case if you want anything, we will call you, connect you back.
Executive: And have you shared the things to owner, ma'am? Is she fine with that?
Customer: She is not. She is out of station. We can't trouble her right now. Uh, her father-in-law has expired, so we can't trouble her right now. So she like last week she told, uh, is it, it's okay. As if now we can't contact her.
Customer: So that's what.
Executive: So she is okay with that?
Customer: She is, that's what I told you, right? She is not, we can't spoke to her right now. She is not in shop. We can't call her also. Her father-in-law has expired.
Executive: Okay, what about, okay, I got it.
Executive: So, uh, what about this one, sir? Because we, uh, we actually cannot provide field visit, that is the reason.
Customer: Uh, that's, that's what I told. It's okay. We can, we can adjust with the Google Meet and whatever services you provide through calls.
Executive: Uh, and moreover, I am sharing you, sir, and your account manager number. Anytime you have issue, you just message us, okay? So we will be able to solve the issue, okay?
Customer: Sure, sure.
Executive: Okay, okay, thank you. So, uh, any other, uh, query you have, ma'am? Because if anything is there, we will get back to you.
Customer: Okay, okay, okay. And one more thing I am trying to say that, uh, you, uh, I am sharing my number also and your manager number also and how to have, you should be active on lead manager and buy leads, okay? Because there only you get direct inquiry also. So kindly be active on lead manager also, right?
Customer: Sure, sure.
Executive: On the also contact you secondary number is, uh, I will put here who number is this?
Customer: Uh, I think it's owner's number and one number is this. So if I'm missing it's required by this.
Executive: 8519608519079.
Executive: 079, one second.
Executive: Can you say the full number?
Customer: Uh, full number is not visible. 8519608519079.
Executive: Uh, one second.
Executive: 8519 is one number. The other one more number is our shop number only. In case if you want anything, you can contact to the same number.
Executive: So that, that belongs to owner?
Customer: Yeah, but you can call to this number. We will inform them.
Executive: Okay, you only receive many other calls.
Executive: I, I thought that I should call to owner also regarding the concern.
Customer: No, no, nothing. No, no, not required.
Executive: Okay, fine then. I am closing your concern, okay, ma'am?
Customer: Sure, sure, sure, ma'am.
Executive: Thank you.
Customer: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Closing ticket for online service and field support.

- Not getting sales from provided leads.

- Wants to share things with the owner.



Resolution:

- Agreed to close the ticket.

- Agreed to attend Google Meet and calls.

- Executive shared her number and manager number.

- Asked to be active on lead manager.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- field visit, google meet, leads, account manager
